response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering this remarkable item to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is a fantastic chance to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. Should you decide to proceed, please let us know, and we'll arrange for immediate delivery. We look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
